sentences.en: Can Harry Potter wave his magic wand and revive a dead language?
sentences.cn: 哈里·波特的魔杖能让已死的语言起死回生 吗 ?

sentences.en: Display their skills in space magic, magic wand Yihui, a mouth Yang.
sentences.cn: 对空间施展精湛魔术, 魔术棒一挥, 嘴角一扬.

sentences.en: Electric bulbs, cookers wand heaters work on this principle.
sentences.cn: 灯泡, 电饭煲和加热器都是靠这个原理动作的.

sentences.en: I suggest posing me with a soldering wand over my head like a sword.
sentences.cn: 我想让自己这样像把剑一样把电焊杆举过头顶.

sentences.en: Imagine this pencil is a magic wand. Now create your dream job.
sentences.cn: 如果这支笔是一根魔法棒, 现在你来描绘一下你的理想工作.

sentences.en: Kate picked up the wand and hid it beneath her cloak.
sentences.cn: 凯特捡起魔杖,藏在她的斗篷底下.

sentences.en: People can't expect him to wave a magic wand.
sentences.cn: 人民不能指望他创造奇迹。

sentences.en: She had recovered her equanimity , and tapped her neighbour with her wand and talked as usual.
sentences.cn: 她已经恢复了平静, 拿柳条轻轻拍打和她并排的女孩子,照旧有说有笑的了.

sentences.en: The conjurer waved his magic wand.
The fairy waved her wand and the table disappeared.
sentences.cn: 那仙女魔杖一挥，桌子不翼而飞。

sentences.en: The magician held his wand over the handkerchief and out hopped a rabbit.
sentences.cn: 那位魔术师将魔棒在手帕上一挥,就蹦出了一只兔子.

sentences.en: The wand looks like a thick heavy pen.
sentences.cn: 这根棒看上去象一支粗大的钢笔.

sentences.en: With something so important, you can't just wave a wand and presto!
sentences.cn: 在这么重大的问题上, 你想挥动一下指挥棒,转眼就变过来,办不到!

sentences.en: You can't simply wave a wand and get rid of nuclear weapons.
sentences.cn: 你们不要以为魔杖一挥便能消除核武器。

trans.tran_cn: 魔杖，指挥棒，嫩枝，（做箭靶的）狭长木板
trans.tran_en: a thin stick that you hold in your hand to do magic tricks

trans.tran_cn: 用扫描笔在…上扫描条形码
trans.tran_en: to move a small scanner over something or someone
